channel.title: Editing Character Files That Are In .P Format
channel.description: Does anybody know how to open these damn files and edit them? If so, help me please?

item.title: Editing Character Files That Are In .P Format
item.dc:creator: @Maddogrun1 Maddogrun1
item.description:
@Maddogrun1 wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:4, topic:474190”][quote author=Maddogrun1 link=topic=592127.msg4184626#msg4184626 date=1355971686]
I tried changing the .p files into .txt format but their unreadable and no real numbers are shown, so its hard to change donor rank, pts, ect.
[/quote]

The .p files are serialized player objects. They’re not meant to be human readable, only to be readable by the server source, and saved in the same manner.[/quote]
Oh… well fuck. Lol, thanks then!

Read full topic
item.source: Editing Character Files That Are In .P Format

item.title: Editing Character Files That Are In .P Format
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Maddogrun1:

I tried changing the .p files into .txt format but their unreadable and no real numbers are shown, so its hard to change donor rank, pts, ect.

The .p files are serialized player objects. They’re not meant to be human readable, only to be readable by the server source, and saved in the same manner.

Read full topic
item.source: Editing Character Files That Are In .P Format
